headline: Is Brown‑Forman’s Recent Rebound Creating a Long Term Value Opportunity?
summary: If you are wondering whether Brown-Forman is finally starting to look like a bargain after years of sliding returns, or if the market still has it roughly right on value, this breakdown is for you. The stock has bounced recently, up 4.9% over the last week and 12.3% over the past month, even though it remains down 18.2% year to date and 29.5% over the last year, with a much steeper 52.4% and 56.2% decline over the past 3 and 5 years. That rebound has come as investors refocus on...
